# Talisman Art Asset Gallery

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/talisman-art-asset-gallery-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:08:18.437984

---

The [**Talisman: Environment**](talisman-environment-template-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite) template showcases an out-of-this-world environment created using custom assets. These assets are packaged and arranged in a new level within the template for you to browse and use for your own projects.

[![Content Browser](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/15dd0ab9-fc6e-4b50-ba0c-167df43c4cfe?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/15dd0ab9-fc6e-4b50-ba0c-167df43c4cfe?resizing_type=fit)

To access these assets within the Talisman: Environment template, navigate to your project's folder within the **Content Browser** and select **AssetArtGallery**.

[![](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c54c9089-098c-41b7-8f0b-312c38fe0ea9?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c54c9089-098c-41b7-8f0b-312c38fe0ea9?resizing_type=fit)

In the top toolbar, you can also navigate to **File** > **Open Level** to open the **AssetArtGallery** level.

Talisman: Environment's assets are thematically sorted into the following categories.

- [Building](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/talisman-art-asset-gallery-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite#building)
- [Props](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/talisman-art-asset-gallery-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite#props)
- [Structures and Kits](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/talisman-art-asset-gallery-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)
- [Materials and Lighting](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/talisman-art-asset-gallery-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)

## Building

Talisman's environment uses many assets to create structures for the rooms and the overall ship.

### Walls

[![Walls](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/39325ce2-02af-4599-9206-d9a1bfc41c8a?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/39325ce2-02af-4599-9206-d9a1bfc41c8a?resizing_type=fit)

### Ceilings

[![Ceilings](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/b50059e8-2800-4591-8327-1737aae7498a?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/b50059e8-2800-4591-8327-1737aae7498a?resizing_type=fit)

### Flooring

[![Floor](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5e2ecf48-4b33-42d0-8147-8d742ce1640b?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5e2ecf48-4b33-42d0-8147-8d742ce1640b?resizing_type=fit)

### Doorways

[![Doorways](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/7c28cc2a-b360-4e4b-8a2a-f368904a18ce?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/7c28cc2a-b360-4e4b-8a2a-f368904a18ce?resizing_type=fit)

## Props

Talisman: Environment uses posters, pipes, and other small-scale assets that bring the environment to life.

### Displays and Posters

[![Displays and Posters](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/03eeae6b-d51b-48dc-856e-bfe66c431e5a?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/03eeae6b-d51b-48dc-856e-bfe66c431e5a?resizing_type=fit)

### Pipes and Cables

[![Pipes and Cables](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ba3fc81c-d15c-45f4-937b-fe7181251337?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ba3fc81c-d15c-45f4-937b-fe7181251337?resizing_type=fit)

## Structures and Kits

This category includes room-defining props such as kitchen counters, and an example of each section's assets assembled in Talisman.
